groupLUXURY.hotel.data

Class HotelFileLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupLUXURY.hotel.data.HotelFileLoader

  • public class HotelFileLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class compasses methods to get object lists from sequential text files.
    Author:
    Sebastian, Maxime, Isaak, Kajal

                                                                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                 java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new Reservation array from a sequential text file, a Customer list and a Room list.
        Parameters:
        filename - The path of the sequential text file.
        customerList - A list of Customer objects.
        roomList - A list of Room objects.
        Returns:
        reservationListArray The Reservation list.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the Customer or the Room are not found.
        java.io.IOException - if there has been an input/output error.
